name: storytailor-vscode-extension
description: plugin for vs code that adds support for storytailor programming language
author: Jack Storytailor

scripts.update:all: npm update && cd server && npm update && cd ../client && npm update
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd .. && cd readme && npm install && cd .. && cd storytailor && npm install && cd ..
scripts.install:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd ..
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
